name: SynthWave
description:
Synthwave... A WayOut In 4D

a hardcore platformer 2D under Progress...

how to play-

2 D Hardcore Platformer

(

Must Defeat Enemies and Find Keys Around de map to Succeed Areas in game

Get Experience and Level up farming with the 2 enemies and one enemy is Invulnerable and took a place for Jump... This Game still Under Development.

)

WASD = Movement

J = Punch

K= Jump ,DoubleJump

L= SynthPower

I = SynthShield

E= Use Doors

Space = Stats Menu

BackSpace= Pause Menu
